text:
I want to inspire people that
look like me to pursue careers

I want it to be
unsurprising, not rare,

I want it to be unsurprising,
not rare, that people of color

I want to bridge the
gap between people

with money, power, and
influence and those

who want to create for the
sake of helping others.

I want to leave the world
better than I found it,

just like those before me who
allowed me to be in a place

where I can vote and attend
Harvard Business School.
I want to make my family proud.
